title: Blade (2025 film)
text:

| Plot = | Cast = * {{WP|Mahershala Ali}} as [[Eric Brooks (Earth-199999)|Blade / Eric Brooks]] * {{WP|Mia Goth}} as '''[[Lilith]]''' | Notes = * {{WP|Bassam Tariq}} was originally planned to direct this film, before he left due to changes in the production schedule.{{cite web|url= https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/marvels-blade-loses-director-bassam-tariq-2023-movie-1235228796/|title= Marvel’s ‘Blade’ Loses Director Bassam Tariq (Exclusive)|work= THR|last= Couch|first= Aaron|coauthors= Kit, Borys|date= September 27, 2022|accessdate= September 28, 2022}} * Originally slated to be released on November 3, 2023, this film was later pushed back to September 6, 2024.{{cite web|url= https://deadline.com/2022/10/blade-fantastic-four-avengers-secret-wars-release-dates-shift-1235141388/|title= Marvel Shifts Release Dates For ‘Blade’, ‘Fantastic Four’, ‘Avengers: Secret Wars’, Next ‘Deadpool’ Among Disney Moves|work= Deadline|last= Grobar|first= Matt|date= October 11, 2022|accessdate= October 12, 2022}} * It was pushed back once again to February 14, 2025.{{cite web|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/disney-moves-avatar-star-wars-avengers-1235514145/|title=‘Avatar 3’ Pushed a Year to 2025, Two ‘Star Wars’ Movies Head for 2026 and ‘Avengers’ Films Delayed|work=The Hollywood Reporter|last=Couch|first=Aaron|date=June 13, 2023|accessdate=June 13, 2023}} * On November 9, 2023, it was reported that the film had been delayed to November 7, 2025.{{cite web|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/deadpool-3-release-dates-captain-america-1235643159/|title=‘Deadpool 3’, ‘Captain America 4’ Among Marvel Release Date Changes as Strike Ends|work=The Hollywood Reporter|last=Couch|first=Aaron|date=November 9, 2023|accessdate=November 10, 2023}} * On June 12, 2024, it was reported that director Yann Demange dropped out of the project.{{cite web|url=https://www.thewrap.com/marvel-blade-director-yann-demange-exits-mcu-eric-pearson/|title=Marvel’s ‘Blade’ Loses Director Yann Demange|work=The Wrap|last=Gonzales|first=Umberto|date=June 12, 2024|accessdate=June 12, 2024}} | Trivia = ==Gallery== ====Logos==== Blade (2025 film) logo 001.jpg Blade (2025 film) logo 002.jpg | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Upcoming Films|Marvel Films]] }} [[ru:Блэйд (фильм, 2025)]] [[tr:Blade (2025 filmi)]]
